meanings.definition: to cry as a cat in heat
meanings.sent1: The kitten wauls loudly when it wants attention.
meanings.sent2: The stray cat wauls at night, looking for a mate.
meanings.sent3: The wailing cat wauls so much, it could be mistaken for a siren.
meanings.sent4: Her heart wauls with loneliness, echoing through the empty house.
meanings.sent5: The haunting sound of the cat wauls through the dark alley.
